name: 3D Ground Truth Sensor
description:
This sensor returns 3D ground truth data for training and creates bounding boxes around the detected objects. The color of the object corresponds to the object's type:
	[
		"Car": "Green"
		"Pedestrian": "Yellow"
		"Bicycle": "Cyan"
		"Unknown":  "Magenta"
	]
See {{DOCS_HOST}}/docs/simulation-content/sensors-list/#3d-ground-truth for more details.
